name: Elegant Embroidered Silk Blouse
description: A stunning silk blouse with intricate hand embroidery work. Perfect for festive occasions and special gatherings. Features premium quality fabric with comfortable fit.

name: Royal Banarasi Designer Blouse
description: Exquisite Banarasi work blouse with traditional zari borders. A masterpiece of Indian craftsmanship that adds regal elegance to any ethnic ensemble.

name: Contemporary Floral Print Blouse
description: Modern floral print blouse with contemporary design elements. Versatile and comfortable, perfect for daily wear or casual occasions.

name: Bridal Heavily Embroidered Blouse
description: Luxurious bridal blouse with heavy thread and zari embroidery. Handcrafted with attention to detail, designed to complement your wedding lehenga perfectly.

name: New Arrival Sequined Party Blouse
description: Latest addition to our collection! Glamorous sequined blouse perfect for parties and celebrations. Features contemporary cut with elegant sequin detailing.

name: Classic Cotton Comfort Blouse
description: Soft cotton blouse with traditional design. Breathable fabric makes it ideal for everyday wear. Simple yet elegant with subtle embellishments.

name: Festive Mirror Work Blouse
description: Beautiful mirror work blouse inspired by traditional Gujarati embroidery. Eye-catching mirror patterns that reflect light beautifully during celebrations.

name: Designer Net Embroidered Blouse
description: Sophisticated net fabric blouse with intricate embroidery overlay. Semi-transparent design adds modern elegance to traditional wear.

name: Bridal Red Silk with Gold Work
description: Stunning bridal blouse in traditional red silk with lavish gold thread work. Premium quality fabric and craftsmanship for your special day.

name: New Arrival Pastel Georgette Blouse
description: Delicate pastel georgette blouse with soft color palette. Flowy fabric with subtle embellishments perfect for spring occasions.

name: Festive Kalamkari Print Blouse
description: Authentic Kalamkari hand-painted design blouse. Traditional art form with intricate motifs, perfect for cultural celebrations.

name: Elegant Chikankari Work Blouse
description: Beautiful white chikankari embroidered blouse with delicate shadow work. Lightweight and comfortable, showcasing fine Lucknowi craftsmanship.

name: Bridal Velvet Embroidered Blouse
description: Luxurious velvet blouse with rich embroidery. Perfect for winter weddings, exuding warmth and elegance with premium fabric.

name: New Arrival Tie-Dye Blouse
description: Trendy tie-dye pattern blouse in vibrant colors. Modern twist on traditional wear, perfect for casual ethnic styling.

name: Festive Organza Ruffled Blouse
description: Elegant organza blouse with designer ruffled details. Flowy fabric with contemporary design elements for special occasions.

name: Classic Embroidered Satin Blouse
description: Smooth satin blouse with classic embroidery patterns. Versatile design that pairs well with various sarees and lehengas.

name: Bridal Maroon Velvet with Peacock Motif
description: Exquisite maroon velvet blouse featuring intricate peacock motif embroidery. Handcrafted masterpiece for the modern bride.

name: New Arrival Metallic Thread Blouse
description: Contemporary blouse with metallic thread embroidery creating a shimmer effect. Modern design with traditional craftsmanship.
